DOC.brief_summary: This single centre , single dose , open , randomised , cross-over , two-stage bioequivalence study compare two different oral formulation NAC . The study conduct healthy volunteer gender , one single dose formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Two Different Formulations N-acetyl-cysteine ( NAC )
